19 class Sim(object):
20  """
21  Oversees instance-based parameters and objects of the simulator.
22  Cars, ball objects, goal position, etc.
23  """
24 
25  class NoURDFError(Exception):
26  pass
27 
28  def __init__(self, props, urdf_paths, spawn_bounds, field_setup, render_enabled):
29  """
30  Initializes the playing field, field properties, and field elements.
31  @param props: Connect the pybullet object based on the gui and direct.
32  @param urdf_paths: Configure: filed type, walls, floor, goal a and b.
33  @param spawn_bounds: Initialize cars list and other data related to them.
34  @param render_enabled: Use the loadURDF via p.loadURDF (loads the specific instruction).
35  """
36  self.touchedLast = None
37  self.ball_noise = None
38  self._speed_bound = None
39  self.init_ball_pos = None
40  # determine if you want to display the simulation
41  if render_enabled:
42  self._client = p.connect(p.GUI)
43  else:
44  self._client = p.connect(p.DIRECT)
45 
46  self.props = props
47 
48  # urdf is used to encode kinetics and location of the object
49  # use it for setting the field type, walls, floor and the different goals
50  self.urdf_paths = urdf_paths
51  self.spawn_bounds = spawn_bounds
52  # set the floor for the simulation
53  zero_pos = [0.0, 0.0, 0.0]
54  zero_orient = p.getQuaternionFromEuler([0.0, 0.0, 0.0])
55  self._plane_id = None
56 
57  # set the goals for the simulation
58  self._goal_a_id = None
59  self._goal_b_id = None
60  if "plane" in urdf_paths:
61  self._planeID = p.loadURDF(
62  urdf_paths["plane"], [0, 0, 0], zero_orient, useFixedBase=1
63  )
64  p.changeDynamics(bodyUniqueId=self._planeID,
65  linkIndex=-1, restitution=1.0)
66 
67  self._goalAID = None
68  self._goalBID = None
69  if "goal" in urdf_paths:
70  self._goalAID = p.loadURDF(
71  urdf_paths["goal"], field_setup["goalA"], zero_orient, useFixedBase=1
72  )
73 
74  self._goalBID = p.loadURDF(
75  urdf_paths["goal"], field_setup["goalB"], zero_orient, useFixedBase=1
76  )
77 
78  self._walls = {}
79  if "sidewall" in urdf_paths:
80  lSidewallID = p.loadURDF(
81  urdf_paths["sidewall"],
82  field_setup["lsidewall"],
83  zero_orient,
84  useFixedBase=1,
85  )
86  p.changeDynamics(bodyUniqueId=lSidewallID,
87  linkIndex=-1, restitution=1.0)
88  self._walls[lSidewallID] = True
89 
90  rSidewallId = p.loadURDF(
91  urdf_paths["sidewall"],
92  field_setup["rsidewall"],
93  zero_orient,
94  useFixedBase=1,
95  )
96  p.changeDynamics(bodyUniqueId=rSidewallId,
97  linkIndex=-1, restitution=1.0)
98  self._walls[rSidewallId] = True
99 
100  if "backwall" in urdf_paths:
101  # TODO: Improve handling of split walls
102  flBackwallID = p.loadURDF(
103  urdf_paths["backwall"],
104  field_setup["flbackwall"],
105  zero_orient,
106  useFixedBase=1,
107  )
108  p.changeDynamics(bodyUniqueId=flBackwallID,
109  linkIndex=-1, restitution=1.0)
110  self._walls[flBackwallID] = True
111 
112  frBackwallID = p.loadURDF(
113  urdf_paths["backwall"],
114  field_setup["frbackwall"],
115  zero_orient,
116  useFixedBase=1,
117  )
118  p.changeDynamics(bodyUniqueId=frBackwallID,
119  linkIndex=-1, restitution=1.0)
120  self._walls[frBackwallID] = True
121 
122  blBackwallID = p.loadURDF(
123  urdf_paths["backwall"],
124  field_setup["blbackwall"],
125  zero_orient,
126  useFixedBase=1,
127  )
128  p.changeDynamics(bodyUniqueId=blBackwallID,
129  linkIndex=-1, restitution=1.0)
130  self._walls[blBackwallID] = True
131 
132  brBackwallID = p.loadURDF(
133  urdf_paths["backwall"],
134  field_setup["brbackwall"],
135  zero_orient,
136  useFixedBase=1,
137  )
138  p.changeDynamics(bodyUniqueId=brBackwallID,
139  linkIndex=-1, restitution=1.0)
140  self._walls[brBackwallID] = True
141 
142  self._cars = {}
143  self._car_data = {}
144  self._ball_id = None
145 
146  self.touched_last = None
147  self.scored = False
148  self.winner = None
149 
150  if 'engine' in self.props and self.props['engine'] is not None:
151  p.setPhysicsEngineParameter(**self.props['engine'])
152  p.setGravity(0, 0, -10)
153 
154  def configure_dynamics(self, body_id, body_type):
155  """
156  Set the car's curvature and general car behavior.
157  @param body_id: The id of the object to be configured.
158  @param body_type: The specific type of object (ie ball,car,goal,etc).
159  @return: Error if not initialized.
160  """
161  if 'dynamics' not in self.props or \
162  self.props['dynamics'] is None or \
163  body_type not in self.props['dynamics']:
164  return
165 
166  num_links = p.getNumJoints(body_id)
167  for i in range(num_links):
168  p.changeDynamics(body_id, i, **self.props['dynamics'][body_type])
169 
170  def create_ball(self, urdf_name, init_pose=None, init_speed=None,
171  noise=None, init_vel=None):
172  """
173  @param urdf_name: The id for the specific pybullet object.
174  @param init_pose: The initial position of the ball (override randomization).
175  @param init_speed: The max speed of the ball (override known speed parameter).
176  @param noise: The noise and if it should be present in the location of the object.
177  @param init_vel: The initial velocity of the ball (override randomization).
178  @return: The ball id if the creation was successful.
179  """
180  if urdf_name in self.urdf_paths:
181  zero_orient = p.getQuaternionFromEuler([0.0, 0.0, 0.0])
182  if init_pose:
183  ball_pos = init_pose["pos"]
184  self.init_ball_pos = ball_pos
185  else:
186  ball_pos = [
187  random.uniform(
188  self.spawn_bounds[0][0], self.spawn_bounds[0][1]),
189  random.uniform(
190  self.spawn_bounds[1][0], self.spawn_bounds[1][1]),
191  random.uniform(
192  self.spawn_bounds[2][0], self.spawn_bounds[2][1]),
193  ]
194  self.init_ball_pos = None
195  self._ball_id = p.loadURDF(
196  self.urdf_paths[urdf_name], ball_pos, zero_orient)
197  self.configure_dynamics(self._ball_id, "ball")
198 
199  # initialize the ball with some speed
200  if init_vel:
201  ball_vel = init_vel
202  else:
203  if init_speed:
204  self._speed_bound = math.sqrt(2.0) * init_speed
205  else:
206  self._speed_bound = 0.0
207  ball_vel = [
208  random.uniform(-self._speed_bound, self._speed_bound),
209  random.uniform(-self._speed_bound, self._speed_bound),
210  0.0,
211  ]
212 
213  p.resetBaseVelocity(self._ball_id, ball_vel, zero_orient)
214  self.ball_noise = noise
215  return self._ball_id
216  else:
217  return None
218 
219  def create_car(self, urdf_name, init_pose=None, noise=None, car_props=None):
220  """
221  Creates instance based car properties(pose,vel,orient) and configures car dynamics.
222  @param urdf_name: The id for the specific pybullet object.
223  @param init_pose: The initial position of the ball (override randomization).
224  @param noise: The noise and if it should be present in the location of the object.
225  @param car_props: Configuration based car properties.
226  @return: The car id if the creation was successful.
227  """
228 
229  # set the spawn location for the car
230  if urdf_name in self.urdf_paths:
231  zero_pos = [0.0, 0.0, 0.0]
232  zero_orient = [0.0, 0.0, 0.0]
233  car_id = p.loadURDF(self.urdf_paths[urdf_name], zero_pos,
234  p.getQuaternionFromEuler(zero_orient))
235  if init_pose:
236  if "pos" in init_pose:
237  car_pos = init_pose["pos"]
238  else:
239  car_pos = zero_pos
240 
241  if "orient" in init_pose:
242  car_orient = init_pose["orient"]
243  else:
244  car_orient = zero_orient
245 
246  init_car_pos = car_pos
247  init_car_orient = car_orient
248  else:
249  car_pos = [
250  random.uniform(
251  self.spawn_bounds[0][0], self.spawn_bounds[0][1]),
252  random.uniform(
253  self.spawn_bounds[1][0], self.spawn_bounds[1][1]),
254  random.uniform(
255  self.spawn_bounds[2][0], self.spawn_bounds[2][1]),
256  ]
257  car_orient = [0.0, 0.0, random.uniform(0, 2 * math.pi)]
258  init_car_pos = None
259  init_car_orient = None
260 
261  self._cars[car_id] = Car(
262  car_id,
263  car_pos,
264  car_orient,
265  car_props
266  )
267 
268  # configures dynamics of the car
269  self.configure_dynamics(car_id, "car")
270 
271  self._car_data[car_id] = {
272  "init_pos": init_car_pos,
273  "init_orient": init_car_orient,
274  "noise": noise,
275  }
276  return car_id
277  else:
278  return None
279 
280  def delete_car(self, car_id):
281  """
282  Removes a car from being tracked in the _cars and _car_data lists.
283  @param car_id: The id of the car in the simulator class.
284  @return: Whether the deletion was successful.
285  """
286  if car_id not in self._cars:
287  return False
288 
289  p.removeBody(car_id)
290  del self._cars[car_id]
291  del self._car_data[car_id]
292  return True
293 
294  def set_car_command(car_id, msg):
295  """
296  Set the command for the car
297  """
298  cars[car_id].setCmd(msg)
299 
300  def step(self, car_cmd, dt):
301  """
302  Moves the sim forward one timestep, checking if a goal is score to end the sim round.
303  @param dt: The change in time (delta-t) for this sim step.
304  """
305  # PyBullet steps at 240hz
306  p_dt = 1.0 / 240.0
307  if self._ball_id is not None:
308  ball_contacts = p.getContactPoints(bodyA=self._ball_id)
309  # TODO: need to decrease ball velocity
310  linear, angular = self.get_ball_velocity()
311  new_linear,new_angular = self.get_decreased_velocity(linear,angular,p_dt)
312  p.resetBaseVelocity(self._ball_id,new_linear,new_angular)
313 
314  for contact in ball_contacts:
315  if contact[2] in self._cars:
316  self.touchedLast = contact[2]
317  elif contact[2] == self._goal_a_id:
318  self.scored = True
319  self.winner = "A"
320  elif contact[2] == self._goal_b_id:
321  self.scored = True
322  self.winner = "B"
323 
324 
325 
326  for _ in range(round(dt / p_dt)):
327  # step kinematic objects independently, at max possible rate
328  for car in self._cars.values():
329  car.step(p_dt)
330  p.stepSimulation()
331  def get_decreased_velocity(self,linear,angular,dt):
332  x_vel,y_vel,z_vel=linear[0],linear[1],linear[2]
333 
334  current_speed = math.sqrt(x_vel*x_vel +y_vel*y_vel)
335  # r*cos(theta), r*sin(theta)
336 
337 
338  if current_speed < 0.001: # a very small number
339  return (0,0,z_vel),angular
340  # for each time step, new_vel = old_vel - myu_r*dt
341  angle = math.atan(y_vel/x_vel)
342  current_speed = current_speed - 0.17 * dt
343 
344  new_x_vel = current_speed*math.cos(angle) # v*cos(theta)
345  new_y_vel = current_speed*math.sin(angle) # v*sin(theta)
346 
347 
348  return (new_x_vel,new_y_vel,z_vel),angular
349 
350  def get_car_pose(self, id, add_noise=False):
351 
352  if id not in self._cars:
353  return None
354 
355  noise = self._car_data[id]['noise']
356  if add_noise:
357  return self._cars[id].get_pose(noise=noise)
358  else:
359  return self._cars[id].get_pose(noise=None)
360 
361  def get_car_velocity(self, id):
362  """Returns a tuple of linear and angular velocity for the car."""
363  if id not in self._cars:
364  return None
365 
366  return self._cars[id].get_velocity()
367 
368  def set_car_command(self, id, cmd):
369  if id not in self._cars:
370  return None
371 
372  return self._cars[id].setCmd(cmd)
373 
374  def get_ball_pose(self, add_noise=False):
375  """@param add_noise: State whether you want noise to get the ball position (default=False)."""
376  if self._ball_id is None:
377  return None
378  pos, _ = p.getBasePositionAndOrientation(self._ball_id)
379 
380  if add_noise and self.ball_noise:
381  if np.random.uniform() < self.ball_noise['dropout']:
382  return None, None
383  else:
384  pos = np.random.normal(pos, self.ball_noise['pos'])
385 
386  return pos, p.getQuaternionFromEuler([0, 0, 0])
387 
388  def get_ball_velocity(self):
389  if self._ball_id is None:
390  return None
391 
392  return p.getBaseVelocity(self._ball_id)
393 
394  def reset(self, spawn_bounds, car_properties, ball_init_pose, ball_init_speed):
395  """
396  Resets the ball, score, winner, spawn bounds, cars and ball.
397  @param spawn_bounds: The new spawn bounds.
398  @param car_properties: The new car properties.
399  """
400  self.scored = False
401  self.winner = None
402  self.touched_last = None
403  if ball_init_pose is not None:
404  self.init_ball_pos = ball_init_pose
405  if ball_init_speed is not None:
406  self._speed_bound = ball_init_speed
407 
408  self.spawn_bounds = spawn_bounds
409  self.reset_ball()
410  for car in self._cars.values():
411  self.reset_car(car, car_properties)
412 
413  def reset_car(self, car, car_properties):
414  """
415  Loops over the cars and generates new initial positions (if they were not specified).
416  @param car_properties: The new car config properties.
417  """
418  # reset the car properties in advance
419  car.set_properties(car_properties)
420  car_pos = self._car_data[car.id]["init_pos"]
421  car_orient = self._car_data[car.id]["init_orient"]
422 
423  if car_pos is None:
424  car_pos = self.generate_new_car_pos()
425 
426  while self.check_if_pos_overlap(car_pos):
427  car_pos = self.generate_new_car_pos()
428 
429  if car_orient is None:
430  car_orient = [0, 0, random.uniform(0, 2 * math.pi)]
431  car.reset(car_pos, car_orient)
432 
433  def check_if_pos_overlap(self, car_pos):
434  """
435  Checks if two cars spawn bounds overlap with each other.
436  @param car_pos: The position of the car.
437  @return: Whether overlap happens (true = need to generate new bounds).
438  """
439  for car in self._cars.values():
440  overlap = car.check_overlap(car_pos)
441  if overlap:
442  return True
443 
444  return False
445 
446  def generate_new_car_pos(self):
447  car_pos = [random.uniform(self.spawn_bounds[0][0], self.spawn_bounds[0][1]),
448  random.uniform(
449  self.spawn_bounds[1][0], self.spawn_bounds[1][1]),
450  random.uniform(self.spawn_bounds[2][0], self.spawn_bounds[2][1])]
451  return car_pos
452 
453  def reset_ball(self):
454 
455  if self._ball_id is not None:
456  ball_pos = self.init_ball_pos
457  if ball_pos is None:
458  ball_pos = [
459  random.uniform(
460  self.spawn_bounds[0][0], self.spawn_bounds[0][1]),
461  random.uniform(
462  self.spawn_bounds[1][0], self.spawn_bounds[1][1]),
463  random.uniform(
464  self.spawn_bounds[2][0], self.spawn_bounds[2][1]),
465  ]
466  p.resetBasePositionAndOrientation(
467  self._ball_id, ball_pos, p.getQuaternionFromEuler([0, 0, 0])
468  )
469  ball_vel = [
470  random.uniform(-self._speed_bound, self._speed_bound),
471  random.uniform(-self._speed_bound, self._speed_bound),
472  0.0,
473  ]
474  p.resetBaseVelocity(self._ball_id, ball_vel, [0, 0, 0])
